name: ROOT for the Rabbit
description:
ROOT for the Rabbit is a 2D sidescroller platformer where you control a rabbit who is looking for some roots to eat! (Carrot, Potato, and Radish) 

Controls: WASD controls for the rabbit 

Platforming in the dark may take a few attempts. There are 3 simple levels in the game since I didn't have that much time for level design.

Hope you enjoy this little game! This was my first 48hr jam without a team so any feedback would be much appreciated!
